name: eagle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a large, strong bird with a curved beak that eats meat and can see very well
metinkiyak/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
Examples
Above the mountain, eagles circled in soundless flight.We saw the eagle swoop from the sky to catch its prey.
